"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a4481d6368723065000345#post_55a4481d6368723065000345
[bq="ToskiHero"]So here's some good news coming from me: _I just the call from my college's theatre, and they want me to come in for an interview for that concessions job I applied for a couple of weeks ago._

I told them I was available for an early interview, so I'll be going in next Tuesday.

_If the interview goes well, and they hire me, I'll be able to start training and working right away, and finally have my first job ever! This is a pretty HUGE deal for me right now!_[/bq]
oh yeah well i have an interview too

and a license now

topics.body: Third year highschool. We have this secret challenge we dubbed "The Hunt". The challenge is they assign a girl to you and you have to make her your girlfriend by one week. And thus I found my first girlfriend. there were six of us in total who completed the challenge.
